short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Ctrl+Up/Down arrows to make pages scroll continously.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroller is an extension that automatically scrolls webpages. Use Ctrl + arrows to adjust scrolling speed or set default values using icon on the top bar.
